title: Videohound's Golden Movie Retriever
description: Videohound's Golden Movie Retriever is the entertaining source of information on more than 27,000 movies available in various formats and through streaming or download outlets. Whether you agree with the opinion or not, you'll appreciate the plot synopses and interesting production notes and trivia our capsule reviews provide. With a multitude of cross-referencing within 9 primary indexes and 2 guides, each new edition includes 1,000 new movies, expanded indexing, a fresh new introduction, and more of the beloved categories.Videos A-Z features full plot summary and review.  Indexes include Category, Kibbles and Series, Awards, Director, Writer, Cinematographer, and Composer.  Video Sources Guide and Web Site Guide."
author: Gale Cengage Learning
